sub_title: Head Safety & Chemistry | Inspection Team leader (OPCW) | Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt | PhD Chemical Engineering (TU Delft) | Design Thinking expert (MIT) | PRINCE2 Project Manager | Risk Management Enthusiast
summary:
chemical/process engineer and supply chain manager with strong analytical skills and breakthrough thinking; results-driven professional in the industrial sector with a solid commitment to deliver that extra mille; certified Lean Six Sigma Blackbelt, certified Lean Six Sigma Green Belt, certified Lean expert; certified Project Manager; process safety expert; knowledge carrier of supply chain modelling (at operational/tactical/strategic levels), product-driven process synthesis approach; textbook author

Specialties: chemical production technology, toxic chemicals, supply chain at strategic, tactical and operational levels, product and process design, design thinking, data analytics, simulation, modelling and design of complex processes involving speciality products; operational excellence, lean six sigma, design and modelling of intensified processes (reactive distillation); multi-scale optimization of supply chain networks; enterprise-wide optimization.

position_groups:
